about_the_game:
Dinosaur Book

This Dinosaur themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! A blast to the very distant past to see the prehistoric!

Contents

The Dinosaur book unlocks the following images:
  • Trilobite - 51x49
  • Mosasaurus - 55x99
  • Ammonite - 71x70
  • Compsognathus- 75x50
  • Brachiosaurus - 81x100
  • Ankylosaurus - 82x55
  • Pachycephalosaurus - 82x82
  • Archaeopteryx - 88x80
  • Achelousaurus- 93x69
  • Spinosaurus - 93x88
  • Tyrannosaurus - 95x97
  • Diplodocus - 95x99
  • Ornithomimus - 96x83
  • Velociraptor- 97x67
  • Dilophosaurus- 97x76
  • Chungkingosaurus- 98x74
  • Triceratops - 99x68
  • Amargasaurus - 100x65
  • Stegosaurus - 100x68
  • Pterodactyl - 100x76

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Dinosaurs Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: Unlocks the Dinosaur themed book for Coloring Pixels! Includes 20 new Dinosaur pixel art pages to complete from the famous Tyrannosaurus Rex to the lesser-known Ammonite!
